string.name: ai_image_privacy_message
string.Data:
"Welcome to AI portraits!
To be able to provide services to you, we need to collect the necessary personal information:
%1$s. To create AI portraits, you'll have to upload photos of people to our servers. We'll collect and process the information about their faces to generate an AI model.
%2$s. When you upload photos of people, we'll sync their names and profile photos from the corresponding albums and associate this information with AI images.
%3$s. When you create AI images based on text, we'll collect the description you provide in order to generate images.
We only collect personal information that is necessary for the specific features of our products and services that you use. You can learn how we collect and process personal information in the AI Portraits Privacy Policy.
Read and agree to AI Portraits User Agreement and AI Portraits Privacy Policy before you continue."

"This person won't be able to view this album if you remove them now. Remove anyway?"

This album will be shared with your family group. It will also be played as a slideshow on the screens available to your family group members.

string.name: slim_finish_upgrade_tip
string.Data: Upgrade your cloud storage plan to sync more items to the cloud. Tap to upgrade now.

resources.string: Keep optimized photos on your device and save the original image to the cloud
Files created in the past %d days will be saved to your device
Store original photos and videos in the cloud while keeping smaller high-quality copies on this device. Smaller copies will replace original files %d days after items are created.
Turn on sync with the cloud to get an estimate of freed space
Upgrade your cloud storage plan to sync more items
"You won't be able to resume the transfer if you stop it now. If you decide to stop the transfer, you can visit i.mi.com to download the items still stored in Xiaomi Cloud."

"Your photos and videos are no longer synced with Xiaomi Cloud. You won't be able to use your private album as it relies on cloud encryption. Until %1$s, you can move your items to Google Photos or visit i.mi.com to download them. After that, the items that are still stored in Xiaomi Cloud will be permanently deleted. %2$s"
Private album is no longer available
"Couldn't download. Connect to the network and try again."
Take photos. Connect charger. Lock device.
Take photos. Connect charger. Lock device.
"Removed items won't appear in this memory again."
"Can't use \"%s\" in the title of a memory. Use letters, digits, and Chinese characters."
You previously stopped a transfer to %1$s. Do you want to resume transferring to this Google Account, or start over using another account?

If you turn off sync now, the ongoing downloads of the original files stored in the cloud will be interrupted. High quality images stored on this device will no longer be available as well. Turn off anyway?
High quality images stored on this device will no longer be available after you turn off sync. You can download original files from the cloud and turn off sync after that.
When sync with the cloud is on, items from this device will be uploaded and merged with the items stored in the cloud.
Not enough space in Xiaomi Cloud
Waiting for the sync to start…

Items have been transferred to Google Photos. View and download unsynced backups before they disappear.
You can download requested items. The download link is only valid for %d days.
Transfer unsynced items before %1$s to avoid losing them

Xiaomi Cloud sync services were replaced with Google Photos backup. All photos and videos previously stored in Xiaomi Cloud have been synced to this device. Now you can turn on Google Photos backup to continue storing items in the cloud.

"Xiaomi Cloud sync services were replaced with Google Photos backup. Some of your photos and videos haven't been synced to this device and will no longer be displayed. However, you've already requested a download of your cloud data that includes these items. You'll be able to view and manage these photos and videos on the device to which you downloaded them."
"Your photos and videos have been transferred to Google Photos. After that, items that haven't been synced to this device won't be displayed. You can view these items among your backups now."

"Xiaomi Cloud sync services were replaced with Google Photos backup. After that, items that haven't been synced to this device won't be displayed. Until %1$s, you can move your items to Google Photos or visit i.mi.com to download them. After that, the items that are still stored in Xiaomi Cloud will be permanently deleted."
Termination of sync services for Gallery items & Transferring items to Google Photos
Xiaomi Cloud replaced with Google Photos backup
Xiaomi Cloud sync services were replaced with Google Photos backup. Downloads of unsynced items are no longer available.
Transfer interrupted. Try again or visit i.mi.com to download items.
Transfer paused. Not enough Google Account storage. Upgrade storage to continue.
Sync with the cloud is no longer available. Transfer or download your items now.
Removing account now. Wait a minute or two and start the transfer again%1$s

View recently deleted photos and videos
Recently deleted items take up %1$s. Delete some to free up space.
Recently deleted items take up %1$s. Delete some to free up space.
All recently deleted items will be permanently deleted from the cloud and all synced devices. Delete anyway?
"Permanently delete all of the items from the cloud and all synced devices? You can't reverse this action."

"Viewing original %s images isn't supported in this version of Android. Download anyway?"
"%1$s images were detected. Viewing %2$s images isn't supported in this version of Android."
"Viewing original %s images isn't supported in this version of Android"
To turn on backup, you need to update Google Photos. Come back to this page after you update Google Photos to continue.
Current version is up to date
Check your network settings and try again

"Xiaomi Cloud sync services were replaced with Google Photos backup. We need to check the items stored on this device and in the cloud to make sure you don't lose anything important. This process might take several minutes. Don't leave Gallery until it's completed."
